mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO > 0 ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ASC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, AUTHORITY, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_DEL_FL = DECODE(MEMBER_DEL_FL, 'Y', 'N', 'Y' ) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
